title: Kaspersky Antivirus 7.0 Trial Resetter
description:
NOTE: THIS IS A TRIAL RESETTER, CAN BE USED AS MANY TIMES WISHED. JUST DO THIS PROCESS AGAIN WHEN YOUR TRIAL EXPIRES. ( I HAVE ONLY TRIED THIS ON 7.0 )

-INSTALLATION/HOW IT WORKS

1. You have to download this torrent

2. You open up "KASPERSKY ANTIVIRUS 7.0"

3. You go into "ACTIVATION", and click "DELETE KEY", then press the X in the right
   corner of the window

4. You go down to your toolbar in the right lower side, and right-click "KASPERSKY 
   ANTIVIRUS 7.0", now click "EXIT"

5. Now run the file "KISTR" (The file you downloaded)

6. Now it comes up with a window.. Press 1, and then press enter

7. Now it says "Done, Should trail reset exit now? (Y/N)", simply just press Y, and
   enter

8. Find your Kaspersky 7.0 directory.. And start it.

9. If the box don't show up itself (The one asking if you wanna renew key) - 
   Then go to "KASPERSKY ANTIVIRUS 7.0" -> "ACTIVATION" -> "INSTALL KEY" And 
   WOLAH! - There it has a option for Trial version. Simply just mark that. And
   you got a month more kaspersky..
   When it expires - Do the process once again.

"EXTRA"-NOTE: Some may think this is a virus since its only on 962 bytes.. But just scan it before you run it.. OR... Enable your Windows Firewall as you do it.
